about_the_game:
Card Dice Roguelike Talk + Stock trading economy + A grand and expansive worldview

Have you ever thought about entering a company as an interviewer, facing different life choices, and ultimately reaching the pinnacle of power, just like this is my company!

Starting from a company, gradually getting promoted, receiving salary increases, and reaching the pinnacle of life~


Starting from a company, gradually getting promoted, receiving salary increases, and reaching the pinnacle of life~

You will start your journey in an office, dealing with different interviewees, deciding to hire and eliminate different job seekers, and gradually gaining the trust of your boss

But please be careful! Some people may come to deceive you, they may not be suitable for this job, you'd better choose your next sentence wisely
During the communication process, the behavior of each job seeker will vary based on their unique psychological characteristics. You need to understand who the people in front of you are, how to treat them, and how to achieve recruitment!

Game Features:


  • Dice random dialogue content


  • Randomly accumulate salary by flipping cards


  • The scores of different candidates determine your power points
  • Special events and special people
  • Rise step by step and eventually swallow up the entire company

Game features:

1. Interview system: Different conversations with different people will produce different effects and ultimately result in different ratings
2. Stock trading system: Continuously accumulating one's own wealth through stock trading, facing different difficulties in life
3. Special Character Event System: Different handling methods can lead to different outcomes

name: 这是我的公司(This Company Of Mine)
short_description: In the urban workplace, you will hold great power and it's time to decide the fate of others. Eliminate those guys you don't like and hire those you like. This is a company that belongs to you!
